thread.title: Craftsy Denver-based online craft giant cuts 12 percent of workforce
thread.title_full: Craftsy Denver-based online craft giant cuts 12 percent of workforce

title: Craftsy Denver-based online craft giant cuts 12 percent of workforce
text:
Craftsy, Denver-based online craft giant, cuts 12 percent of workforce 
Denver Post Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Beth Ferrier records a Craftsy video on applique for quilting. (Cyrus McCrimmon, Denver Post file) Craftsy, the Denver-based firm that offers a slew of online crafting classes, as well as supplies, thinned its operations by laying off 32 employees, the company's founder and CEO confirmed Thursday.The majority of the cuts come from the production side of the business, which has developed upward of 1,000 online classes that cover topics such as cooking, woodworking and quilting, said John Levisay, chief executive of Craftsy operator, Sympoz Inc.The affected employees were provided severance pack...
